title: Universal Robots partners with Robotiq and Siemens for smart palletizing
description:
Universal Robots has integrated its robot arm with Robotiq's palletizing cell and Siemens' digital twin software to make palletizing more efficient.

The post Universal Robots partners with Robotiq and Siemens for smart palletizing appeared first on The Robot Report.
